openRouter.title: What a real request/response looks like in the OpenRouter gateway
openRouter.description: The screenshot shows a typical workflow: you send a prompt (input tokens), the model generates a response (output tokens). These two flows form the cost of each request in the calculator above. Even our own bot works on the same principle: we carefully count input and output in tokens and route requests through optimal models so you only pay for the real value of the response.
